seo.meta_description: string (150-160 characters, includes location if applicable + CTA)

sections.heading: string

trust_signals: array of trust elements like '30-day guarantee', 'No setup fees']

services_included: array of service slugs included in this package

benefit_examples.title: 24/7 Availability
benefit_examples.description: Never miss a lead again. Our AI agents answer calls around the clock, even when your team is off the clock.

benefit_examples.title: Instant Lead Qualification
benefit_examples.description: AI agents ask the right questions to qualify leads immediately, so your sales team only talks to ready-to-buy prospects.

benefit_examples.title: Lower Cost Per Lead
benefit_examples.description: Reduce your customer acquisition costs with highly targeted ads that reach only your ideal customers.

benefit_examples.title: Scalable Growth
benefit_examples.description: Handle 10 calls or 1,000 calls per day without hiring additional staff. Our AI scales with your business.

benefit_examples.title: Real-Time Analytics
benefit_examples.description: See exactly where your leads come from, which ads perform best, and your ROI in real-time dashboards.

benefit_examples.title: Seamless Integration
benefit_examples.description: Works with your existing CRM, calendar, and tools. No complicated setup or tech headaches.

faq_examples.question: How does Voice AI work for my business?
faq_examples.answer: Our Voice AI agents are trained specifically for your business. They answer calls using natural conversation, ask qualifying questions, schedule appointments, and even transfer hot leads to your sales team—all automatically. It's like having a professional receptionist working 24/7 without the overhead.

faq_examples.question: What kind of businesses benefit most from Voice AI?
faq_examples.answer: Service-based businesses see the biggest impact—HVAC companies, law firms, medical practices, home services, real estate, and any business that gets phone inquiries. If you're missing calls or spending too much time on the phone with unqualified leads, Voice AI is perfect for you.

faq_examples.question: How much do I need to spend on Google Ads?
faq_examples.answer: We recommend starting with at least $1,000/month in ad spend to test and optimize campaigns. Our Growth package includes management for $1,000-$3,000/month ad spend. For larger budgets, our Enterprise package offers custom solutions.

faq_examples.question: Can I cancel anytime?
faq_examples.answer: Yes! We don't lock you into long-term contracts. You can cancel anytime with 30 days' notice. We believe in earning your business every month by delivering results.

faq_examples.question: How quickly will I see results?
faq_examples.answer: Voice AI can be set up and answering calls within 1-2 weeks. For paid ads (Google/Facebook), you'll start seeing traffic immediately, but it typically takes 30-60 days to fully optimize campaigns for best ROI.

faq_examples.question: Do you work with businesses outside of Tennessee?
faq_examples.answer: Absolutely! While we're based in Knoxville, TN, we work with service businesses nationwide. Our Voice AI and advertising services are 100% virtual and work for any location.

faq_examples.question: What makes you different from other marketing agencies?
faq_examples.answer: We focus exclusively on automation and lead generation for service businesses. We combine cutting-edge Voice AI with proven paid advertising strategies to help you capture more clients with less effort. Plus, we're transparent, no-contracts, and results-focused.

faq_examples.question: Will the AI sound robotic?
faq_examples.answer: Not at all! Our AI voice agents use advanced natural language processing and human-like voices. Most callers don't even realize they're talking to AI. We can also customize the voice, tone, and conversation style to match your brand.

use_case_examples.scenario: An HVAC company was missing 40% of calls during peak season because their receptionist was overwhelmed. They implemented our AI Voice Agent to handle after-hours and overflow calls.
use_case_examples.result: They captured 150+ additional leads per month and increased revenue by $45,000 in the first 90 days.

use_case_examples.scenario: A personal injury law firm was spending $8,000/month on Google Ads but had no way to track which leads came from ads versus other sources. We implemented tracking and Voice AI lead qualification.
use_case_examples.result: They reduced cost per qualified lead by 52% and now only pay for ads that generate real cases.

use_case_examples.scenario: A plumbing company wanted to grow but couldn't afford to hire more office staff. They automated their appointment scheduling with our AI Receptionist.
use_case_examples.result: They now handle 3x more calls without additional overhead, and customer satisfaction scores increased because calls are answered instantly.

use_case_examples.scenario: A real estate agent was wasting time on unqualified buyer leads. We set up Facebook Lead Ads with AI voice follow-up to pre-qualify before the agent even got on the phone.
use_case_examples.result: The agent now spends 70% less time on unqualified leads and closed 5 additional deals in the first quarter.

service_national: Best {Service} Agency | Automate Your Lead Generation

meta_description_patterns.service_location: Looking for {service} in {city}? Capture Client helps {city} businesses {main benefit}. {Feature 1}, {Feature 2}, and more. Call 865-346-3339!
meta_description_patterns.service_national: {Service} for small businesses nationwide. {Main benefit} with {feature 1} and {feature 2}. No contracts. Proven results. Get started today!
meta_description_patterns.package: Our {package name} includes {top 3 features} for just ${price}/month. Perfect for {ideal customer}. No setup fees. Cancel anytime. Get started today!

notes.usage: This schema template is used by page generator agents to create consistent, SEO-optimized marketing pages for Capture Client.
notes.customization: Each page generator should customize content based on specific service, location, or national keyword while maintaining this structure.
notes.images: All image URLs should be populated during page generation using Unsplash via Jina AI scraping.
notes.seo_focus: Every page must be optimized for conversions with clear CTAs, trust signals, and lead capture forms.
notes.content_length: Service pages: 1500-2000 words | Location pages: 1200-1800 words | National SEO pages: 2000-2500 words | Package pages: 1000-1500 words
